originalText.text: It‚Äôs convenient as in open 24 hours, a walk from several residential buildings, they usually will greet you well if you approach them with courtesy of course. That being said, the deli always somehow gets my order wrong in one way or another. Be it the wrong cheese, meat or which sandwich size given even if you‚Äôre the only one ordering. Just be cautious of that when getting your food. Other than that it‚Äôs your standard deli with the classic orders, snacks and beverages.

originalText.text:
Local store. Convenient.
They have pared down their available selections from when they first opened. They are pretty basic now.
Closes on Muslim holy days & some Fridays briefly or some Fridays all day.

originalText.text: I wish I could give 'em 20 üåüs!!! The amount of awesome things about this store can't fit in this review. They make our favorite foods, have the freshest coffee. My children & I, 3 or 4 times a week raid their fridge for our favorite beverage. It's like if Cheers had a corner store version... Emerson would be it! HANDS DOWN THEE BEST OF THE REST IN THIS NEIGHBORHOOD. üòçüòçüòçüòç

originalText.text: Normally 4 to 5 star service. But depending on the time of day that you go, you can also receive 2 to 3 star service. Some if the workers can use a customer service etiquette class.
